job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Your mission will be to ensure the improvement of our products with a team and supporting all countries in reaching their targets by providing smart advanced analytics solutions, to strengthen the clients

   leadership in digitalization & support our 40 million customers.

   We work in a fun and creative environment, and we're dedicated to bringing out the best in both our

   relations and our projects, ranging from enhancing our virtual assistants in production via innovative

   NLP techniques such as Generative AI and Large Language Models to building speech analytics use

   cases across all the countries our client operates in.

   The opportunity

   As a cloud solution engineer, you will be partnering with Data Analysts and Customer Journey Experts

   (CJE) to design and implement Google Cloud Native infrastructure for the use of leading-edge

   conversational AI products, such as a compliant generative AI chatbot. As a Cloud Engineer, you

   understand business needs, can architect GCP cloud solutions, understand data needs, and can inform

   on using the right cloud solutions to operationalize the conversational platform and thus increase our clients contact center agents' efficiencies. You can with the GCP APIs and code pipelines to support the team's needs. You can productize and operationalize (GCP) cloud-native applications for production, You Will Be Responsible For
     * Implementation and productionalization of cloud solutions using Generative AI and LLM

   technologies.
     * Advice on which Google Cloud Platform products to use.
     * Making cloud designs and technical decisions for conversational systems projects at clients

   Analytics.
     * Creating data pipelines that interact with DialogFlow.
     * Implementing GCP native ML architectures.
     * Contributing to strengthening the cloud capability within the team.
     * Implementing Looker Dashboards, BigQuery datasets/views, and working with Vertex AI
job_details.full_text:
CLOUD ENGINEER (TERRAFORM, AZURE DEVOPS)

Your mission will be to ensure the improvement of our products with a team and supporting all countries in reaching their targets by providing smart advanced analytics solutions, to strengthen the clients

   leadership in digitalization & support our 40 million customers.

   We work in a fun and creative environment, and we're dedicated to bringing out the best in both our

   relations and our projects, ranging from enhancing our virtual assistants in production via innovative

   NLP techniques such as Generative AI and Large Language Models to building speech analytics use

   cases across all the countries our client operates in.

   The opportunity

   As a cloud solution engineer, you will be partnering with Data Analysts and Customer Journey Experts

   (CJE) to design and implement Google Cloud Native infrastructure for the use of leading-edge

   conversational AI products, such as a compliant generative AI chatbot. As a Cloud Engineer, you

   understand business needs, can architect GCP cloud solutions, understand data needs, and can inform

   on using the right cloud solutions to operationalize the conversational platform and thus increase our clients contact center agents' efficiencies. You can with the GCP APIs and code pipelines to support the team's needs. You can productize and operationalize (GCP) cloud-native applications for production, You Will Be Responsible For
     * Implementation and productionalization of cloud solutions using Generative AI and LLM

   technologies.
     * Advice on which Google Cloud Platform products to use.
     * Making cloud designs and technical decisions for conversational systems projects at clients

   Analytics.
     * Creating data pipelines that interact with DialogFlow.
     * Implementing GCP native ML architectures.
     * Contributing to strengthening the cloud capability within the team.
     * Implementing Looker Dashboards, BigQuery datasets/views, and working with Vertex AI

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on cloud infrastructure, deployment, and data pipelines within Google Cloud Platform (GCP), mentioning technologies like Terraform and Azure DevOps (though the role specifies GCP). While it mentions Generative AI and LLMs, the core responsibilities and technologies listed (GCP, DialogFlow, Looker, BigQuery, Vertex AI) point towards a Cloud Engineer role focused on operationalizing AI solutions rather than developing or fine-tuning the AI models themselves. The emphasis is on infrastructure and deployment, not on core AI model development or advanced prompt engineering, which are central to a GenAI Engineer profile. It also lacks the depth of ML-specific tasks required for an ML Engineer. Therefore, it falls under 'Ambiguous' as it's a technical role but not directly fitting the core definitions of ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer as per the coding book, leaning more towards infrastructure and operationalization of AI services.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Creating data pipelines that interact with DialogFlow' directly relates to building and maintaining data flows, a core aspect of data engineering.
job_tasks.phrase: Creating data pipelines that interact with DialogFlow

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Implementing GCP native ML architectures' indicates involvement in the setup and deployment of machine learning model infrastructures, which is a part of the modeling lifecycle, especially in an operational context.
The mention of 'working with Vertex AI' implies interaction with a platform for building and deploying ML models, fitting within the broader scope of modeling tasks.
The phrase 'You can with the GCP APIs and code pipelines to support the team's needs' suggests writing code to integrate services and build functionalities, which is a software development task.
job_tasks.phrase: You can with the GCP APIs and code pipelines to support the team's needs

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'productize and operationalize (GCP) cloud-native applications for production' involves building and deploying applications, a key software development responsibility.
job_tasks.phrase: productize and operationalize (GCP) cloud-native applications for production

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Implementation and productionalization of cloud solutions using Generative AI and LLM technologies' directly relates to deploying and managing AI solutions in a production environment, which is MLOps.
job_tasks.phrase: Implementation and productionalization of cloud solutions using Generative AI and LLM technologies

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'operationalize the conversational platform' points to the process of making a platform functional and maintainable in a live environment, a core MLOps concern.

The phrase 'Advice on which Google Cloud Platform products to use' and 'Making cloud designs and technical decisions for conversational systems projects' relates to architecting and planning the deployment and operational aspects of cloud solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: Advice on which Google Cloud Platform products to use

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Creating data pipelines that interact with DialogFlow' also fits here as it relates to the operational flow of data within a conversational AI system.
job_tasks.phrase: Creating data pipelines that interact with DialogFlow

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Implementing Looker Dashboards, BigQuery datasets/views' relates to setting up and managing data infrastructure for operational use and reporting.

soft_skills.phrase: partnering with Data Analysts and Customer Journey Experts (CJE)
inform on using the right cloud solutions
strengthening the cloud capability within the team
design and implement Google Cloud Native infrastructure
Making cloud designs and technical decisions
innovative NLP techniques such as Generative AI and Large Language Models
